column3: 2015 condolences service information candles symbolic gestures photos memories share this tribute add photo add memory add condolence of bernice dube. bernice dube
column8: 2015 at morris view nursing home in morristown after suffering from a long illness. bernice was born on march 15
column10: nj and was a long time resident of long valley since 1965. she retired from flocktown road school where she worked as a secretary to the principal for more than 31 years. bernice was a member of the rosary society and an active parishioner at st. lawrence church in chester. she enjoyed nature
column13: gardening and trips to atlantic city and loved traveling. bernice is survived by her loving husband of 57 years
column14: norman dube; her three daughters catherine mackay and her husband stephen
column15: lisa dube-forman and her husband bobby
column16: and jeanette dube; her grandchildren robert c. kane
column17: and collin and kayla mackay; and her siblings doris budrick and donald reed. she was predeceased by her brother
column18: benjamin reed. a celebration of bernices life will include a memorial gathering from 11am to 12:30pm on tuesday
column20: 2015 at the william j. leber funeral home
column23: nj (908) 879-3090. a 1pm funeral mass will follow at st. lawrence church in chester. interment will be held privately. in lieu of flowers
column24: memorial donations may be made to the michael j. fox foundation
column27: md 21741-5014. print add condolence who we are:we are a family owned funeral home and are genuinely dedicated and committed to family service. our qualified staff is available 24 hours a day and we are available to assist your family in customizing a funeral or cremation service that reflects your desires. our location:15 furnace road. chester
